netic field generated by them would be similar to the properties of electrical charges and
the electromagnetic field generated by them: in particular, the force lines of the magnetic
field, generated by magnetic charges, start from/end in the magnetic charges, while the
force lines of the electrical field generated by currents of magnetic charges are closed, i.e.
